高精制碳水化合物饮食及其摄入引起的变化是否与小肠变化有关？研究人员调查了高精制碳水化合物饮食和相关的代谢改变是否会导致小肠失调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Are-a-high-refined-碳水化合物-饮食-and-the-alterations-resulting-from-its-intake-linked-to-small-intestine-更改.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Are-a-high-refined-碳水化合物-饮食-and-the-alterations-resulting-from-its-intake-linked-to-small-intestine-更改.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8609b087-93d8-4418-bc8f-3568b058adf3 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 06:02:00 -0400 Are a high-refined carbohydrate diet and the alterations resulting from its intake linked to small intestine changes?
洞察婴儿大脑发育：研究表明声音持续时间如何影响听觉感知研究人员研究了声音持续时间处理的早期成熟，这是一个重要的听觉时间特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Insights-into-infant-brain-development-study-shows-how-sound-duration-shapes-auditory-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Insights-into-infant-brain-development-study-shows-how-sound-duration-shapes-auditory-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ab6209e-2d07-430d-9998-4799fc9e36c8 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 05:45:00 -0400 Insights into infant brain development: study shows how sound duration shapes auditory perception
COVID-19 感染的严重程度是否是慢性疼痛的新危险因素？研究人员调查了 SARS-CoV-2 感染的严重程度是否会增加慢性疼痛的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Is-COVID-19-severity-of-infection-a-new-risk-factor-for-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Is-COVID-19-severity-of-infection-a-new-risk-factor-for-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d92554b-215b-4040-8287-d57025c958d4 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 05:38:00 -0400 Is COVID-19 severity of infection a new risk factor for chronic pain?

疾病负担审查评估整个欧洲风险因素造成的负担研究人员进行了系统回顾，以绘制疾病负担评估图，包括在欧洲进行的风险因素，并确定比较风险评估和其他风险评估方法中的方法选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Burden-of-disease-review-asseses-the-burden-attributable-to-risk-factors-across-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Burden-of-disease-review-asseses-the-burden-attributable-to-risk-factors-across-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2563e48-fbd0-49f2-8743-be181e3164ed Tue, 27 Jun 2023 04:52:00 -0400 Burden of disease review assesses the burden attributable to risk factors across Europe
超出预期：研究发现耐药结核病的治疗成功率存在差距研究人员对耐药结核病的全球治疗结果进行了审查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Beyond-expectations-study-finds-treatment-success-gap-in-drug-pressive-Tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Beyond-expectations-study-finds-treatment-success-gap-in-drug-pressive-Tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70b2dbf6-5f5b-4283-ab7d-56838ff37f5a Tue, 27 Jun 2023 04:41:00 -0400 Beyond expectations: study finds treatment success gap in drug-resistant Tuberculosis
新研究显示人类和动物冠状病毒之间的抗体交叉反应研究人员探索了针对所有七种人类冠状病毒 (hCoV) 的抗体结合情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-research-shows-antibody-cross-reactivity- Between- human-and-animal-coronaviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/New-research-shows-antibody-cross-reactivity- Between- human-and-animal-coronaviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=011b2bad-061f-4093-8033-11e1672feb12 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 03:58:00 -0400 New research shows antibody cross-reactivity between human and animal coronaviruses
交互式仪表板提高手部卫生合规性手部卫生是预防医疗保健中感染传播的最简单、最有效的方法，但医护人员的依从性往往较低。两个卫生系统的感染预防专家将于 6 月 26 日至 28 日在佛罗里达州奥兰多举行的感染控制和流行病学专业人员协会 (APIC) 年会上展示他们成功的手部卫生干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Interactive-dashboards-improve-hand-hygiene-compliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Interactive-dashboards-improve-hand-hygiene-compliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea90b2bb-fe91-49d1-895a-b4c99045a831 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 02:18:05 -0400 Interactive dashboards improve hand hygiene compliance
敦促医院采取新的 MRSA 预防策略由五个医疗组织组成的小组发布了预防耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌（MRSA）传播和感染的最新建议。在美国，MRSA 引起大约 10% 的医院相关感染，此类感染与死亡风险增加相关。 MRSA 引起的某些感染在前几年下降后，在大流行期间增加了 41%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Hospitals-urged-to-adopt-new-MRSA-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Hospitals-urged-to-adopt-new-MRSA-prevention-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae319d2a-bf93-455e-8a08-09fa340020b3 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 01:40:07 -0400 Hospitals urged to adopt new MRSA prevention strategies
新颖的计算工具有助于分析复杂的遗传区域GeneDx（纳斯达克股票代码：WGS）是通过基因组和临床见解改善健康结果的领导者，今天在《自然方法》上发表了一篇论文，题为“泛基因组的多尺度分析能够改善重复和临床相关基因的基因组多样性的代表性”，其中研究人员开发了一种新的计算工具，即泛基因组研究工具套件（PGR-TK），用于对以前过于复杂而无法分析的临床相关基因进行可扩展分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-Computational-tool-helps-analyze-complex-genic-regions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-Computational-tool-helps-analyze-complex-genic-regions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b9cb872-2d8a-41a0-8617-c7f1df3f260c Tue, 27 Jun 2023 01:33:06 -0400 Novel Computational tool helps analyze complex genetic regions
